SEARCH
Package at.ac.tuwien.sepm.assignment.individual.persistence

Interface HorseDao

All Known Implementing Classes:
HorseJdbcDao
public interface HorseDao
Data Access Object for horses. Implements access functionality to the application's persistent data store regarding horses.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Horse
    create(HorseCreateDto newHorse)
    Create a new horse in the persistent data store.
    void
    delete(long id)
    Delete a horse by its ID from the persistent storage.

    Get all horses stored in the persistent data store.

    Get a horse by its ID from the persistent data store.

    Search for horses matching the criteria in searchParameters

    update(HorseDetailDto horse)
    Update the horse with the ID given in horse with the data given in horse in the persistent data store.

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      List<Horse> getAll()
      Get all horses stored in the persistent data store.
      Returns:
      a list of all stored horses

    • search

      List<Horse> search(HorseSearchDto searchParameters)
      Search for horses matching the criteria in searchParameters

      The returned stream of horses never contains more than searchParameters.maxAmount elements, even if the there would be more matches in the persistent data store.

      Parameters:
      searchParameters - object containing the search parameters to match
      Returns:
      a stream containing horses matching the criteria in searchParameters

    • update

      Horse update(HorseDetailDto horse) throws NotFoundException
      Update the horse with the ID given in horse with the data given in horse in the persistent data store.
      Parameters:
      horse - the horse to update
      Returns:
      the updated horse
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the Horse with the given ID does not exist in the persistent data store

    • getById

      Horse getById(long id) throws NotFoundException
      Get a horse by its ID from the persistent data store.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the horse to get
      Returns:
      the horse
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the Horse with the given ID does not exist in the persistent data store

    • create

      Horse create(HorseCreateDto newHorse)
      Create a new horse in the persistent data store.
      Parameters:
      newHorse - the data to create a new horse
      Returns:
      the newly created horse

    • delete

      void delete(long id) throws NotFoundException
      Delete a horse by its ID from the persistent storage.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the horse to delete
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the Horse with the given ID does not exist in the persistent storage.
